ygData.messageBody:
At 10:43 PM 9/7/99 +0200, you wrote:
>From: "Janko S." <janko@...>
>
>I recently had a fight about this so can anyone please tell me if a lvl 5
>bard is usefull in a group that contains lvl 5 to lvl 7 characters and if
>not when is it usefull.

Bards are ALWAYS useful. From day 1, we have group-affecting always-on
songs, never need to meditate for mana, and as we gain more and more
levels, we become more and more valuable. I've said it before, and I'll
say it again: All other classes add to the value of a group, but Bards
multiply the whole equation.

Talies the mathematically challenged
